summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness against the General Fund of The City of Seattle, in the sum of Eleven Thousand and no/100 Dollars ($11,000.00) for the purpose of completing the improvement of 31st Avenue South and King Street, by grading the same, as authorized by Ordinance No. 21189, creating Local Improvement District No. 2095.
